title: Welcome to Social Studies with Ms. Sonoma!
subject: social studies
blurb: Explore how Ms. Sonoma teaches about people and places

vocab.definition: A group of people who live in the same area
Someone who works to make the community better
A person who belongs to a community

examples: Your neighborhood is a community. The people who live on your street are your neighbors.
Community helpers include teachers, firefighters, and doctors. They help keep everyone safe and healthy.
Good citizens help their community by being kind, following rules, and taking care of shared spaces.

comprehension.question: What is a community?
acceptable: people living in the same place

comprehension.question: Is a teacher a community helper?
Can you name one way to be a good citizen?
